ShockTherapy_Range.Description: Shock Therapy range, in centimeters. Distance from the center of the killer's capsule to the tip of the shock therapy zone

ShockTherapy_Range_LineShape.Description: Shock Therapy line shape range, in centimeters. Distance from the center of the killer's capsule to the tip of the shock therapy zone

ShockTherapy_SecondsToCharge.Description: Time required to charge the shock therapy attack

ShockTherapy_Delay.Description: Delay between spawning the AoE object and damaging the survivors

MadnessTier1.Description: Madness points required to reach tier 1 insanity

MadnessTier2.Description: Madness points required to reach tier 2 insanity

MadnessTier3.Description: Madness points required to reach tier 3 insanity

Post_SnapOutOfIt_Madness.Description: Madness after using Snap Out Of It

ShockTherapy_MadnessGain.Description: Insanity points inflicted by shock therapy attack

Madness2IllusionaryDoctorIntervalMinimum.Description: Minimum wait time before an illusionary doctor is spawned in madness tier 2

Madness2IllusionaryDoctorIntervalMaximum.Description: Maximum wait time before an illusionary doctor is spawned in madness tier 2

Madness3IllusionaryDoctorIntervalMinimum.Description: Minimum wait time before an illusionary doctor is spawned in madness tier 3

Madness3IllusionaryDoctorIntervalMaximum.Description: Maximum wait time before an illusionary doctor is spawned in madness tier 3

IllusionaryDoctorFrontalDistance.Description: The initial placement for the illusionary doctor is this many centimetres in front of the survivor in the direction the camera is facing.

IllusionaryDoctorRadialVarianceMaximum.Description: The radius, starting at the initial placement point, in which the illusionary doctor can be spawned.
